Name: ALILIA 亚利利亚的精灵们
About the game: The story of the game is mainly about the magic of Alliria that meets various elves and solves the collapse of the rules that appear in the forest. A relaxed and pleasant story, a simple ARPG, and a brainstorming adventure. Basic operation You can change the above keys by pressing the keyboard F1 key. system introduction Magic can be used to attack monsters In addition to attacks, magical skills can be used to acquire items, assist in customs clearance, and open organs. Summon Elf: Each elf has a different role, summon them, help you get the items, and help you pass. Item use: In addition to HP, SP, there are also various uses.
